Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_NAME
Define.Description: The test identifier of the installed test.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_VERSION
Define.Description: The PTS test profile version of the installed test.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_CHECKSUM
Define.Description: The MD5 check-sum of the test's main executable script.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_SYSIDENTIFY
Define.Description: A hash of the system's hardware/software configuration at the time of the test's installation. This is used to determine at a later time whether the test should be re-installed or not based upon platform differences.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_INSTALLTIME
Define.Description: A time-stamp of when the test was installed.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_INSTALLTIME_LENGTH
Define.Description: How long (in seconds) that it took the test to install.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_LASTRUNTIME
Define.Description: A time-stamp of when the test was last run by the Phoronix Test Suite.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_TIMESRUN
Define.Description: An integer of the number of times the test has been executed.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_AVG_RUNTIME
Define.Description: The average time (in seconds) that it takes to run this test based upon all the times the test has been run on the given system.

Define.Name: P_INSTALL_TEST_LATEST_RUNTIME
Define.Description: The time (in seconds) it took to complete the most recent run of this test.
